National Public Security Internet Station Security Service Platform IDC User Operation Manual

Last updated: March 2017

Operation guidance for the IDC front-end page

1) Registration

Input www.beian.gov.cn in the address bar to enter the Internet Security Service Platform of the Nationwide Public Security Bureaus. Click the “IDC login for the access provider”, and then click “Register” in the bottom to skip to the registration page.


Enter the correct username, password, email, phone number, verification code and phone verification code, and then click “Register”. Skip to the landing page after registration completion.

2) Login

Click the “IDC login for the access provider” and enter the user’s name and password entered during registration to enter the management page.


3) Fill in the IDC main information

After entering the website, when prompted to “fill in the IDC information”, click “Enter”.


Accurately fill in the IDC information according to the regulations. A photo ID shall be uploaded according to requirements for review. Click “Submit for review” after completing IDC information.


4) Website Access Management

After filling in the IDC information, click “Website Access Management”, then click “Access Website Import Template”.


After the template is downloaded, fill in the template as required. After filling it in, click “Browse” to select the filled in file, and click "Upload”. After uploading, the successful upload prompt indicates that the upload was successful, then wait for review.

5) Computer Room Management

After filling in the IDC information, click “Computer Room Management - Import Template for the Computer Room”.


After the template is downloaded, fill in the template as required. After filling it in, click “Browse” to select the filled in file, and click "Upload”. After uploading, the successful upload prompt indicates that the upload was successful, then wait for review.

6) Superior Access Provider Management

After filling in the IDC information, click “Higher-Level Access Provider Management - Higher-Level Access or Carrier Import Template.”


After the template is downloaded, fill in the template as required. After filling it in, click “Browse” to select the filled in file, and click "Upload”. After uploading, the successful upload prompt indicates that the upload was successful, then wait for review.

7) Lower-Level Access Provider Management

After filling in the IDC information, click the “Lower-Level Access Provider Management - Lower-Level Access or Carrier Import Template.”


After the template is downloaded, fill in the template as required. After filling it in, click “Browse” to select the filled in file, and click "Upload”. After uploading, the successful upload prompt indicates that the upload was successful, then wait for review.

8) IP Block Management

After filling in the IDC information, click the “IP Block Management - IP Block Import Template”.


After the template is downloaded, fill in the template as required. After filling it in, click “Browse” to select the filled in file, and click "Upload”. After uploading, the successful upload prompt indicates that the upload was successful, then wait for review.
